amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount made available for "Department of Housing and Urban Development-Management and Administration-Executive Offices" by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount made available for "Department of Housing and Urban Development-Management and Administration-Executive Offices" by $2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 232 (Roll no. 291).
